title: wow this ocean week  day is going slow today
body: wtf are we going to make it

replies.body: Just need to rally the troops! get on that twisted treeline double points action

Did anyone else notice that Riot reduced the amount of points for today =P

It dropped from 165,000 to 155,000.

Or was it always 155,000 and I'm just stoopid? o_O

Due to the extended patch downtime compared to normal and some [server issues](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/zcrEGeXl-resolved-server-issues-28th-jan-2016) that occured this morning - we reduced the point requirement for today - it's not a fair challenge when time gets taken away from you before it even really starts!
im not sure why the points got raised after we failed the previous one?  You'd assume that if we couldnt do an easier one, making it harder would kinda doom it..

The problem was that you guys did Twisted Treeline on the day when a lot of people started school, and with a less popular game mode and a less player count with a patch that some people actually don't bother downloading it because from the previous days, they already had enough points to collect the individual rewards. If the Twisted Treeline was first and Summoners Rift (or even ARAM) was in for today, the chances would be a lot better for us to reach the goal. Tomorrow is a Friday and that means everyone can play a lot later than usual so yeah, you guys kinda get the point I hope.

tl;dr not popular game mode, not many people because school, patch, people got 10+ points from before, not as many people care.
Not only was there the patch, school just started for a lot of us! There is/was hardly any time for any games to be played :(
6 hours left and it's just at the halfway mark. Welp
To be honest.... 24hours to get 155000 points sound like a "mission impossible" to me XD but the peak hours hasnt come yet...

Consider the fact that the first 10 hours or so was half the patch, and half our activity trough.

It's still very possible cause last i checked it was 10k an hour, which is very doable considering we have peak time coming.
